snippet: PepsiCo Inc reported better-than-expected quarterly profit and sales and recorded revenue growth in its Americas beverages business for just the second time in nearly four years, helped by higher demand and an increase in prices.
abstract: PepsiCo reports second-quarter profit of $1.98 billion, or $1.33 per share; revenue fell 5.7 percent to $15.92 billion.
lead_paragraph: PepsiCo Inc reported better-than-expected quarterly profit and sales and recorded revenue growth in its Americas beverages business for just the second time in nearly four years, helped by higher demand and an increase in prices.

headline.main: PepsiCo Profit, Revenue Beat Estimates as Higher Pricing Pays Off
headline.print_headline: Business Briefing; PepsiCo Uses ‘Creative’ Tactics to Lift Its Quarterly Revenue
